wikipedia_page.main: Frank Coulston (born 5 October 1942) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Partick Thistle, Stranraer and Stenhousemuir in the Scottish Football League in the 1960s and 1970s. Coulston was part of the Partick Thistle side that surprisingly won the Scottish League Cup Final by 4–1 against Celtic in 1971.
